## Built Environment Health Equity Data

[Data Source](https://datacatalog.urban.org/dataset/72-small-and-medium-size-cities-built-environment-and-health-equity-dataset)

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)

urbandata <- read_csv("health.equity.data.csv") %>%
    janitor::clean_names()

library(ggplot2)
```
##Graph 1: Unemployment and Opioid Deaths

```{r}
urbandata %>%
  janitor::clean_names() %>%
  ggplot() +
  geom_col(
    mapping = aes(x = region, y = opioid_overdose_deaths),
    color = "orange") +
  labs(title = "Unemployment vs. Opioid Deaths by Region",
  x = "Region",
  caption = "Source: Urban Institute") +
  theme(
  plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5),
  plot.subtitle = element_text(hjust = 0.5),
  plot.caption = element_text(hjust = 0.75)) 



geom_col(
    mapping = aes(x = region, y = total_unemployment_percent),
    color = "blue")

 filter(is.na(total_unemployment_percent) & 
           is.na(opioid_overdose_deaths) & 
           is.na(region)) %>%
```
